extension.summary: Stream 1000s and 1000s of Dj sets, mixtapes and ravepacks in one place so OiOi lets get xbmc raving to the sound of the oldskool
extension.description: Stream oldskool rave tape packs oldskool pirate radio sets podcasts mixtapes and live oldskool radio,[CR] Acid house, house, hardcore, jungle and drum n bass and much more for your raving needs.
